title: Urban Classics Men's Basic Crew Neck Tall Tee Short Sleeve Oversized Short Sleeves T-Shirt with Dropped Shoulders, 100% Jersey Cotton
breadCrumbs: Fashion > Men > Clothing > Tops, T-Shirts & Shirts > T-Shirts
description: URBAN CLASSICS Men's Basic Tall Tee. Do you want a t-shirt that works just as hard as you do? Urban Classics' Basic Tall Tee is a wardrobe essential for every man. Universally flattering, this basic t-shirt is made of 100% Jersey cotton, assuring breathability and high wearing comfort. Made to be worn baggy, this tall tee features a relaxed long fit as it has a longer torso than normal t-shirts, perfect for big, tall and beefy men. The dropped shoulders ensure high wearability and freedom of movement. This t-shirt features a classic crew neck and goes great with every look: wear it under your normal clothes for a casual look or make it look elegant when combined with a leather jacket. The product features the following characteristics: Material: 100% Cotton, Jersey, 180 GSM | Fitting: oversized long fit | Sizes: S-6XL| Colours available: black, brown, green, charcoal, grey, limegreen, navy, orange, red, royal, turquoise, white, dusty blue, redwine, bottlegreen, vintage blue, concrete, darkshadow | Dropped Shoulders | Washing instructions: machine wash at 30°C. In 2005 URBAN CLASSICS saw the light of day in the streetwear world and from that moment until today, it embodies much more than just a brand logo. The variety of URBAN CLASSICS products is inexhaustible. The tees, hoodies, college jackets, sweatpants, shirts and tanks do without motif prints and elaborate logos. Simple, underlined with blocked colour accents, the inimitable urban cut line of the streetwear is revealed. URBAN CLASSICS focuses on a clean design. This is less about the label and more about the unique character - classic cuts that "never go out of style".

description: So children are always well dressed. Thanks to its synthetic upper, this Velcro shoe is not only comfortable, but also easy to clean. Thanks to the soft textile inner lining, even long walks without pressure points are no problem. The interchangeable footbed can be replaced with your own insoles in a few simple steps. The Velcro fastener can also be easily closed by children and ensures the perfect fit on the foot. The transparent rubber outsole does not slip and is also ideal for the hall. This all-rounder can be worn with a sporty outfit consisting of sweatpants and T-shirt as well as a trendy combination of jeans and basic shirt. A great partner for sports and leisure: the Velcro shoe from LICO. Regular fit and medium shoe width.

breadCrumbs: Fashion > Men > Clothing > Activewear > Shirts & Tees > T-Shirts
description: Under Armour Tech 2.0 SS Tee - stay dry, comfortable and relaxed during training and sports.Offering comfort and style together, this workout shirt is designed for active men with a passion for exercise and sport. The t-shirt can be worn during times of physical endurance and of relaxation. Crafted from a lightweight and breathable material, the shirt prevents overheating. The anti-odour technology of the fabric means no strong body odour or excess sweating. The tee features short sleeves and a loose fit for comfort.
